Description: Lower body sherd of early Chian patterned pottery chalice with part of cul; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black with traces of added white bands; exterior: reserved save for group of vertical strokes in handle zone; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 13)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 643, no. 15, pl. 21.2.3)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0294) (phase 2)
